metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36310 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8. arch/x86/kvm/svm/svm.c allows a set_memory_region_test infinite loop for certain nested page faults, aka CID-e72436bc3a52.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-10-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-10-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-10-generic-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-aws - 5.15.0-1002.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-azure - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required
